item.title: Glat boost learning and collaboration efficiency
item.description: Glat: Goal of Life = Action + Time -> Knowledge Goal is something you want but don’t have yet In order to achieve your goal, or in other words, to obtain the desired things, one needs to take actions to change the current situation. However, it’s easier said than done. It’s often difficult to map out the exact route from the current situation to the desired goal. Therefore, when we experiment with different actions, we obtain knowledge that is unique to us.
